channel.title: Onion Structure on Skycoin Updates
channel.description: Recent content in Onion Structure on Skycoin Updates

item.title: Development Update #63
item.description: If you know your wallet seed, you will be fine. You can open up the wallets with text editor and grab the seed. As long as you have this value, your wallet can never be lost. You can also just copy and paste the wallet directory. Eventually, I want to change the wallet deterministic generation function to SHA3/Keccak sponge function based instead of SHA256, but it is too late for this.
